attributes.action: Launch an extensive military strike against Iran to bring home our 15 people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I pledge that the UK conducts a military strike so extensive that

A) Iran gives us back our hostages.

B) Iran regrets so much that she won't commit acts of war against the UK for a long time.

Iran has made an ACT of war against us. It is time for us to ACT and make them regret what they have done because had we made them regret the last abduction of UK soldiers, they wouldn't have tried their luck this time round.

Such a military strike against Iran should include targets like 

A) Nuclear installations.
B) Petrolium refinaries
C) Bridges
D) Government buildings

using cruise missles at times of the day/night where minimal casualties are inflicted on the Iranians.

REGARDLESS of whether the Iranians hand over our people or not - they must be made to regret what they have done.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
